about.me: I am a hardworking, dedicated, stake pool operator who is originally from the UK but currently living in Germany. I have made videos on my YouTube channel to help aspiring stake pool operators and I have featured in Adam Stokes' videos. Mr. Adam Stokes is a prominant Cryptocurrency YouTuber. I am happy to answer ANY questions you may have about staking. Please feel free to contact me via FB, Telegram, or Twitter.
about.server: I have 1 block producer (the main node) + 4 relays distributed in the USA, Europe, and Asia for maximum coverage.
